Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
I think this is most of the usefulness of the mouse binding feature.

This might not be the final implementation of the configuration interface, but having a working implementation will be useful for getting feedback on what sort of tweaks would make this better. I have some ideas I will post to the bug tracker issue on how to handle bindings to the window area.

Other than that, I think the last thing to do is mouse bindings to the bar, which I think will be mostly independent of this.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
I would like it if you considered putting this in 4.8.

Mouse bindings on the bar may not even be that useful, so I think this stands on its own just fine.

Whatever changes this needs I think will be minor at this point, and as it is, I think this could be a really big improvement to the wm.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
If problems arise, I am prepared to fix them in a dot release.

With all the work this took, I wouldn't want to delay this for people another 3-5 months.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Sorry, I didn’t see these messages before doing the release. But even if I had read them, this is not the way we stabilize new features. Merging them as early as possible into “next” after a release is a much better way. Every release is costly in terms of manpower and distribution, so I’d like to avoid dot releases.
